sections.heading: by jury.The Attorney General or defendant may demand that any claim under the Uniform Deceptive Trade Practices Act be tried by a jury

sections.text:
87-303.13.Trial by jury.

The Attorney General or defendant may demand that any claim under the Uniform Deceptive Trade Practices Act be tried by a jury.

SourceLaws 2024, LB934, ยง 7.
